subtitleNullable: Collection of news articles covering events in Nigeria for the year 2019
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Nigeria, officially the Federal Republic of Nigeria, is a country in West Africa. It is the most populous country in Africa and in Sub-Saharan Africa. It has also been facing a lot of regional problems, one of which being BokoHaram. There are also regional conflicts in protests against governments. 

Boko Haram is a terrorist organization based in northeastern Nigeria, which is also active in Chad, Niger and northern Cameroon. In 2016, the group split, resulting in the emergence of a hostile faction known as the Islamic State's West Africa Province. 


### Content

Due to this constant conflict and situation of unrest, this data set provides news articles and other details of conflicts and events in Nigeria.


### Acknowledgements

This data would not be available without the UNDP Crisis group.
